Name: Lugging
Description: For moving stuff around by hand.

Name: Running
Description: Running about swiftly and efficiently.

Name: Sports
Description: Physical Activity for the Entertainment of the Masses.

Name: Wheat Farming
Description: The Specialized Skill for Farming Wheat

Name: Grain Milling
Description: The skill of managing the quality of milled grain.

Name: Cooking
Description: The general cooking skill.

Name: Baking
Description: The specialized skill of cooking various breads.

Name: Mine Engineer
Description: The Skill for managing and organizing Mining operations.

Name: Smelting
Description: The skill for smelting raw metal ores into refined ingots.

Name: Herder
Description: Animal Herding and care for the sake of food.

Name: Cotton Farming
Description: The skill of caring for a Cotton Plantation.

Name: Silkworm Farming
Description: A farmer who harvests silk worms for their silk.

Name: Weaving
Description: The skill of weaving threads into cloth.

Name: Spinner
Description: The Skill of spinning raw threads into useful spun threads.

Name: Tailoring
Description: The skill of taking basic cloth and forming clothing from it.

Name: Panning
Description: The art of pulling gold out of bodies of water.

Name: Minting
Description: The craft of turning precious metals into coinage efficiently.

Name: Goldsmithing
Description: The art of crafting gold into various bits of jewelry.

Name: Coffee Farming
Description: The skill of managing and caring for a Coffee plant.

Name: Dyeing
Description: The skill of dying cloth evenly and efficiently.

Name: Fishing
Description: The skill of fishing.

Name: Oil Drilling
Description: The skills of running and drilling oil.

Name: Steelworking
Description: The skill of forming steel into various forms.

Name: Opium Farming
Description: The skill of caring for Opium Plants.

Name: Apple Farming
Description: The skill of caring for Apple Trees.

Name: Rubber Farming
Description: The skill of farming rubber trees.

Name: Shepherding
Description: The skill of herding sheep and goats.

Name: Tea Farming
Description: The skill of farming Tea plants.

Name: Lumberjacking
Description: The skill of efficiently cutting down trees.

Name: Tobacco Farming
Description: The skill of caring for Tobacco plants.

Name: Laborer
Description: A general Purpose Laborer.

Name: Shipwright
Description: The Skill of Making Ships.

Name: Chemistry
Description: The skill of mixing substances to create useful products.

Name: Glassworking
Description: The skill of working glass.
